lead_paragraph: Memo to: Mr. Bloomberg Experts, academics, union leaders, politicians and ordinary New Yorkers have advice for the mayor-elect on varied topics. PAGE F5 '60 Minutes' Cuts Back CBS News is cutting back on producers at ''60 Minutes'' because of the expense of covering the war in Afghanistan. PAGE C1
